name: Robbie Caver's Cave Jumping Adventure!
description:
Robbie Caver is stuck in a cave! Dodge boulders for as long as you can!

- Click on Robbie Caver's face to start!

- Use 'A' and 'D' or left and right to move him

- Space is to jump!

- Don't press the quit button as it will cause the game to hang!
